hero.title: About IEEE RGIPT
hero.subtitle: Student Branch
hero.description: Advancing technology for humanity through innovation, education, and collaboration at Rajiv Gandhi Institute of Petroleum Technology.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To foster technological innovation and professional development among students while building a strong community of future engineers and technologists.
points: Promote technical excellence through workshops and seminars
Provide networking opportunities with industry professionals
Encourage research and development in emerging technologies
Build leadership skills through student-led initiatives

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To be the leading student organization that bridges the gap between academic learning and industry requirements, creating globally competent engineers.

history.title: Our Journey
history.description: IEEE RGIPT Student Branch was established to create a platform for students to explore, learn, and excel in various fields of engineering and technology.

milestones.title: Foundation
milestones.description: IEEE Student Branch established at RGIPT

milestones.title: First Workshop Series
milestones.description: Launched technical workshop series for students

milestones.title: Digital Transformation
milestones.description: Adapted to online events during pandemic

milestones.title: Industry Partnerships
milestones.description: Established partnerships with leading tech companies

activities.title: What We Do
activities.description: Our diverse range of activities caters to different interests and skill levels

categories.title: Technical Workshops
categories.description: Hands-on sessions covering latest technologies like AI/ML, Web Development, Mobile App Development, and more.

categories.title: Competitive Programming
categories.description: Regular coding contests and DSA workshops to enhance problem-solving skills.

categories.title: Hackathons
categories.description: Multi-day coding competitions where students build innovative solutions to real-world problems.

categories.title: Industry Talks
categories.description: Sessions with industry experts sharing insights about current trends and career opportunities.

categories.title: Research Projects
categories.description: Collaborative research initiatives in emerging fields of technology.

categories.title: Networking Events
categories.description: Opportunities to connect with alumni, industry professionals, and fellow students.

stats.label: Active Members
stats.description: Students actively participating in our programs

stats.label: Industry Partners
stats.description: Companies collaborating with us for events and internships

stats.label: Projects Completed
stats.description: Student projects mentored and completed successfully

items.title: Innovation
items.description: Encouraging creative thinking and novel solutions to complex problems.

items.title: Excellence
items.description: Striving for the highest standards in all our activities and initiatives.

items.title: Collaboration
items.description: Working together to achieve common goals and support each other's growth.

items.title: Learning
items.description: Continuous learning and adaptation to stay current with technological advances.

items.title: Leadership
items.description: Developing leadership skills and taking initiative in driving positive change.

items.title: Integrity
items.description: Maintaining ethical standards and transparency in all our endeavors.

assign.title: IEEE RGIPT Alumni Selected as Junior Executives at Airports Authority of India
assign.description: Congratulations to Abhinav Tripathi, Aman Singh, Basant Kumar, and Shekhar Kumar on their provisional selection as Junior Executives (Electronics) at the Airports Authority of India, marking a proud achievement for IEEE RGIPT Student Branch.

assign.title: IEEE RGIPT Student Branch Wins Best Emerging Student Branch & 1st in Activity Based Incentive Award
assign.description: IEEE RGIPT Student Branch was honored with the Best Emerging Student Branch Award and secured 1st position in the Activity Based Incentive Award.

assign.title: IEEE RGIPT Students Reach Top 5 in IIT Bombay Techfest 2024 Meshmerize Competition
assign.description: IEEE RGIPT students secured a Top 5 finalist position at the Meshmerize Competition during IIT Bombay Techfest 2024, showcasing innovation, robotics skills, and teamwork.

assign.title: IEEE RGIPT Wins Awards at IEEE UP Section AGM 2025
assign.description: IEEE RGIPT Student Branch secured First Place in the Activity-Based Incentive Award and Best Emerging Student Branch Award at the IEEE UP Section AGM 2025, recognizing dedication, teamwork, and innovation.

assign.title: IEEE Student Branch Orientation
assign.description: The IEEE RGIPT Student Branch successfully conducted its orientation programme for the batch of 2024, introducing new members to the vision, mission, and opportunities within IEEE.

assign.title: Announcement of registration for KodeKurrent
assign.description: Registration for KodeKurrent Season One had officially started, marking the launch of a 24-hour software hackathon, internship opportunities, and a VLSI workshop.

assign.title: IEEE RGIPT Student Branch's Kode Kurrent Season One - Winners Announcement
assign.description: The Champions of KodeX101, KodeX102, and KodeX103 were announced.

assign.title: Expert Session on IoT Applications by Dr. Aditya Singh
assign.description: A guest lecture by Dr. Aditya Singh on energy for IoT applications, hosted by IEEE RGIPT Student Branch.

assign.title: Workshop 2.0 ‚Äì Web Development with Nitesh Saini
assign.description: An interactive web development workshop covering backend, DevOps, and real-world deployments, hosted by IEEE RGIPT Student Branch and IEEE Computer Society.

assign.title: Workshop 2.0 ‚Äì Open Source & GitHub with Aayush Kumar
assign.description: A practical workshop on open source development and version control using Git & GitHub, hosted by IEEE RGIPT Student Branch in collaboration with the IEEE Computer Society.

assign.title: Workshop 2.0 ‚Äì Computer Society DSA Session (Day 1)
assign.description: Day 1 of IEEE RGIPT Computer Society Workshop 2.0 focused on DSA fundamentals and problem-solving strategies, conducted by Sunny Kumar and Agastya Yadav.

assign.title: Workshop 2.0 ‚Äì Computer Society Web Development Session (Day 2)
assign.description: Day 2 of IEEE RGIPT Computer Society Workshop 2.0 focused on frontend, backend, and full-stack web development, conducted by Nitesh Saini.

assign.title: Workshop 2.0 ‚Äì Computer Society Open Source Session (Day 3)
assign.description: Day 3 of IEEE RGIPT Computer Society Workshop 2.0 covered open source fundamentals and hands-on GitHub contributions, conducted by Aayush Kumar.

assign.title: Workshop 2.0 ‚Äì Machine Learning with Arihant Jain
assign.description: An IEEE RGIPT Computer Society workshop introducing foundational ML concepts, algorithms, real-world applications, and career insights, conducted by Arihant Jain.

assign.title: Workshop 2.0 ‚Äì Augmented & Virtual Reality with Swayanshu Rout
assign.description: An IEEE RGIPT Computer Society workshop exploring AR/VR technologies, tools, applications, and industry impact, conducted by Swayanshu Rout.

assign.title: KodeKurrent Season 1 ‚Äì Internship Winners at Roostoo
assign.description: IEEE RGIPT hackathon participants Adarsh Kumar, Pushkar Raj, Tanish Maheshwari, and Pranesh Sharma secured internships at Roostoo for their outstanding performance.

assign.title: KodeKurrent Season 1 ‚Äì Prodigal AI Internship Winners
assign.description: Participants of IEEE RGIPT‚Äôs KodeKurrent Season 1, including Aayush Kharbanda, Sunny Kumar, and others, earned internships at Prodigal AI for their outstanding performance in the hackathon.

assign.title: Launch of DevWave ‚Äì CS Skill Up Series 2.0
assign.description: IEEE RGIPT‚Äôs DevWave track offers interactive workshops, mentorship, and hands-on projects in software development, UI/UX, web & app design, and product engineering.

assign.title: Launch of CodeNex ‚Äì CS Skill Up Series 2.0
assign.description: IEEE RGIPT‚Äôs CodeNex track provides workshops, coding contests, and mentorship to enhance competitive programming, DSA skills, and placement readiness.

assign.title: Webinar on UI/UX Design with Jitu Raut
assign.description: An exclusive IEEE RGIPT webinar on UI/UX design, featuring Jitu Raut, former Director of Design at Flipkart and CheQ, covering Figma, Framer, and LottieFiles.

assign.title: Jay Kumar Sinha Selected for IEEE India Council SCT 2025
assign.description: IEEE RGIPT congratulates Jay Kumar Sinha for being selected in the Outreach & Partnerships Team of IEEE India Council SCT 2025, recognizing his leadership and dedication.

assign.title: DevWave Web Development Challenge Winners ‚Äì CS Skill Up Series 2.0
assign.description: Winners of the DevWave web development challenge, part of CS Skill Up Series 2.0, were Aadya Agarwal, Ashutosh Sharma, and Vedant Singh, recognized for creativity and technical excellence.

assign.title: CodeNex Challenge Winner ‚Äì CS Skill Up Series 2.0
assign.description: Aadarsh emerged as the winner of CodeNex, the competitive programming challenge under CS Skill Up Series 2.0, demonstrating outstanding problem-solving and coding skills.

assign.title: ElectroWave Challenge Winner ‚Äì CS Skill Up Series 2.0
assign.description: Krishna Gupta won the ElectroWave electronics challenge under IEEE‚Äôs Skill Up Series 2.0, showcasing creativity, problem-solving, and technical excellence.

assign.title: GATE Series Session with Vivek Pawar ‚Äì IEEE RGIPT SB
assign.description: IEEE RGIPT SB‚Äôs GATE Series features Vivek Pawar, GATE CS AIR 60 and ML Engineer at Qualcomm, sharing strategies, insights, and guidance for GATE preparation.

assign.title: GATE Series Session with Bhawna Jain ‚Äì IEEE RGIPT SB
assign.description: IEEE RGIPT SB‚Äôs GATE Series hosts Bhawna Jain, GATE EE‚Äô24 AIR 41 and Scientist at BARC, sharing preparation strategies, tips, and inspiration for GATE aspirants.

assign.title: GATE Series Session with Divyansh Tripathi ‚Äì IEEE RGIPT SB
assign.description: IEEE RGIPT SB‚Äôs GATE Series features Divyansh Tripathi, GATE DS & AI AIR 75, sharing strategies, AI/DS project insights, and preparation tips for GATE aspirants.

assign.title: Signal Processing Session with Anirudh Roy ‚Äì IEEE RGIPT SB
assign.description: IEEE RGIPT SB presents Anirudh Roy, PhD Scholar at Purdue University, sharing expertise in mixed-signal SoC design, Delta Sigma ADCs, and advanced signal processing techniques.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: Ready to join our community or have questions about our activities?
